name: Note Blast Lite
description:
Learn the notes on the staff and where they are on the guitar in a fun way. You have three lives and have to destroy 30 notes to get to the next level. Good Luck!


Note Blast works on learn the notes one string at a time on the guitar.
The first level is learning the notes on the E string of the guitar. The best thing is you get to blow up the notes!
Have fun learning and blowing up your notes to some bluesy background tunes.

Included is a practice area to learn the notes.
Note Blast has a Game Centre scoreboard so you can see how your going in comparison with the rest of the world.
There is also a private scoreboard that tracks your local scores though this will upload to whatever Game Centre account that is logged in on the phone.

NOTE:
This Lite version only has two levels to get you started.
The Full version allows you to learn all the notes of the first three frets
